title: Catherine Miller - GW Center For Integrative Medicine Reiki Yoga
description: Catherine Miller is a provider of Reiki in-person via home visits and online sessions. She is also a yoga teacher, nutrition coach.
cleaned_text: Reiki, Yoga, Nutrition Coaching Catherine first experienced Reiki after having a craniotomy to remove a brain tumor. It had such a profound effect on her and led her to study this healing modality. She completed her Reiki Master Teacher training under [Mara Benner](https://gwcim.com/people/mara-benner/) and volunteered at a local DC hospital offering Reiki services to patients, their family members, and staff, which has provided her experience for a broad range of health conditions. Catherine has her 200-hour Yoga Teacher Certification from the [Kripalu School of Yoga,](https://kripalu.org/schools/yoga) and has certifications in Yin Yoga, Divine Sleep Yoga Nidra, and Mindful Resilience for Trauma Recovery. She also supports individuals in achieving their health goals as a Certified Health & Wellness Coach, and has her M.S. in Nutrition and is working to become a Licensed Nutritionist. Catherine works at Four Direction Wellness and provides Reiki, Yoga and Nutrition Coaching for GWCIM patients. She offer Reiki in person via home visits. Reiki and coaching via Zoom are also available. To make an appointment with Catherine Miller contact
